import React from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import "../../styles/testimonial.css"; import ava01 from "../../assets/all-images/ava-1.jpg"; import ava02 from "../../assets/all-images/ava-2.jpg"; import ava03 from "../../assets/all-images/ava-3.jpg"; import ava04 from "../../assets/all-images/ava-4.jpg"; const Testimonial = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, autoplay: true, speed: 1000, swipeToSlide: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, }, }, ], }; return (

I had an amazing experience renting a car from this company. The booking process was fast and easy, and the car was in excellent condition. The unlimited miles option was a game-changer, and I was able to explore the city without worrying about mileage restrictions. I highly recommend this car rental service!

Zachary Macharia

Customer

I needed a car for a business trip, and this company exceeded my expectations. The pickup process was smooth, and the car was clean and well-maintained. I also appreciated the many pickup locations, which made it convenient for me to choose the one closest to my hotel. Overall, a great experience!

Juliet Waringa

Customer

"I was hesitant to rent a car for my first solo trip, but this company made it easy and stress-free. The booking process was fast and secure, and the pickup location was convenient and easy to find. The car was in excellent condition, and the unlimited miles option allowed me to explore the city at my own pace. I would definitely rent from this company again!

Jeffery wamalwae

Customer
